name: Fool Fighters [mugen]
description:
This is a mugen hack (2013-2014) based on original chars & stages created by Masa, Dcelso, Hsiehtm, Omegapsycho, N64Mario84, Lord-S, Doorhenge, Dark Saviour & Qkrtkf.



Then, most of the sprites have been replaced (by mine), sounds edited and hit boxes updated.



Art direction, sprite digitalization, design, story and customization by Barbie Chêtif.



Original Soundtrack by Barbie Chêtif except 4'33" by John Cage & Les coincoins by Fabien Porée.



The pack comprises the cover sleeves (for both PC & Sega Genesis), the coloured owner's manual and of course the mugen game. Enjoy !
